verses.verse: In the third <S%H7969><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of the reign <S%H4438><s%> of Jehoiakim <S%H3079><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> came <S%H935><s%> Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> unto Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, and besieged it <S%H6696><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H136><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> Jehoiakim <S%H3079><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> into his hand <S%H3027><s%>, with part <S%H7117><s%> of the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>: which he carried <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Shinar <S%H8152><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of his god <S%H430><s%>; and he brought <S%H935><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> into the treasure <S%H214><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> of his god <S%H430><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto Ashpenaz <S%H828><s%> the master <S%H7227><s%> of his eunuchs <S%H5631><s%>, that he should bring <S%H935><s%> certain of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and of the king <S%H4410><s%>'s seed <S%H2233><s%>, and of the princes <S%H6579><s%>;

Sons <S%H3206><s%> in whom was no blemish <S%H3971><s%>, but well <S%H2896><s%> favored <S%H4758><s%>, and skillful <S%H7919><s%> in all wisdom <S%H2451><s%>, and skillful <S%H3045><s%> in knowledge <S%H1847><s%>, and understanding <S%H995><s%> science <S%H4093><s%>, and such as had ability <S%H3581><s%> in them to stand <S%H5975><s%> in the king <S%H4428><s%>'s palace <S%H1964><s%>, and whom they might teach <S%H3925><s%> the learning <S%H5612><s%> and the tongue <S%H3956><s%> of the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> appointed <S%H4487><s%> them a daily <S%H3117><s%> provision <S%H1697><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%>'s food <S%H6598><s%>, and of the wine <S%H3196><s%> which he drank <S%H4960><s%>: so nourishing <S%H1431><s%> them three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, that at the end <S%H7117><s%> there they might stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>.
Now among these were of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, Daniel <S%H1840><s%>, Hananiah <S%H2608><s%>, Mishael <S%H4332><s%>, and Azariah <S%H5838><s%>:

Unto whom the prince <S%H8269><s%> of the eunuchs <S%H5631><s%> gave <S%H7760><s%> names <S%H8034><s%>: for he gave <S%H7760><s%> unto Daniel <S%H1840><s%> the name of Belteshazzar <S%H1095><s%>; and to Hananiah <S%H2608><s%>, of Shadrach <S%H7714><s%>; and to Mishael <S%H4332><s%>, of Meshach <S%H4335><s%>; and to Azariah <S%H5838><s%>, of Abed <S%H5664><s%>â€“nego.

But Daniel <S%H1840><s%> purposed <S%H7760><s%> in his heart <S%H3820><s%> that he would not defile <S%H1351><s%> himself with the portion <S%H6598><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%>'s food <S%H6598><s%>, nor with the wine <S%H3196><s%> which he drank <S%H4960><s%>: therefore he requested <S%H1245><s%> of the prince <S%H8269><s%> of the eunuchs <S%H5631><s%> that he might not defile himself <S%H1351><s%>.
Now God <S%H430><s%> had brought <S%H5414><s%> Daniel <S%H1840><s%> into favor <S%H2617><s%> and tender love <S%H7356><s%> with <S%H6440><s%> the prince <S%H8269><s%> of the eunuchs <S%H5631><s%>.

And the prince <S%H8269><s%> of the eunuchs <S%H5631><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Daniel <S%H1840><s%>, I fear <S%H3373><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>, who has appointed <S%H4487><s%> your food <S%H3978><s%> and your drink <S%H4960><s%>: for why should he see <S%H7200><s%> your faces <S%H6440><s%> worse liking <S%H2196><s%> than the sons <S%H3206><s%> which are of your sort <S%H1524><s%>? then shall you make me endanger <S%H2325><s%> my head <S%H7218><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> Daniel <S%H1840><s%> to Melzar <S%H4453><s%>, whom the prince <S%H8269><s%> of the eunuchs <S%H5631><s%> had set <S%H4487><s%> over Daniel <S%H1840><s%>, Hananiah <S%H2608><s%>, Mishael <S%H4332><s%>, and Azariah <S%H5838><s%>,

Prove <S%H5254><s%> your servants <S%H5650><s%>, I beg you <S%H6235><s%>, ten days <S%H3117><s%>; and let them give <S%H5414><s%> us vegetables <S%H2235><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%>, and water <S%H4325><s%> to drink <S%H8354><s%>.

Then let our countenances <S%H4758><s%> be looked upon <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H4758><s%>, and the favor of the sons <S%H3206><s%> that eat <S%H398><s%> of the portion <S%H6598><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%>'s food <S%H6598><s%>: and as you see <S%H7200><s%>, deal <S%H6213><s%> with your servants <S%H5650><s%>.
So he consented <S%H8085><s%> to them in this matter <S%H1697><s%>, and proved <S%H5254><s%> them ten <S%H6235><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>.

And at the end <S%H7117><s%> of ten <S%H6235><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> their countenances <S%H4758><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> fairer <S%H2896><s%> and fatter <S%H1277><s%> in flesh <S%H1320><s%> than all the sons <S%H3206><s%> which did eat <S%H398><s%> the portion <S%H6598><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%>'s food <S%H6598><s%>.

Thus Melzar <S%H4453><s%> took away <S%H5375><s%> the portion of their food <S%H6598><s%>, and the wine <S%H3196><s%> that they should drink <S%H4960><s%>; and gave <S%H5414><s%> them vegetables <S%H2235><s%>.

As for these four <S%H702><s%> sons <S%H3206><s%>, God <S%H430><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> them knowledge <S%H4093><s%> and skill <S%H7919><s%> in all learning <S%H5612><s%> and wisdom <S%H2451><s%>: and Daniel <S%H1840><s%> had understanding <S%H995><s%> in all visions <S%H2377><s%> and dreams <S%H2472><s%>.

Now at the end <S%H7117><s%> of the days <S%H3117><s%> that the king <S%H4428><s%> had said <S%H559><s%> he should bring <S%H935><s%> them in <S%H8269><s%>, then the prince of the eunuchs <S%H5631><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> them in before <S%H6440><s%> Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> talked <S%H1696><s%> with them <S%H4672><s%>; and among them all was found none like Daniel <S%H1840><s%>, Hananiah <S%H2608><s%>, Mishael <S%H4332><s%>, and Azariah <S%H5838><s%>: therefore stood <S%H5975><s%> they before <S%H6440><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>.

And in all matters <S%H1697><s%> of wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and understanding <S%H998><s%>, that the king <S%H4428><s%> inquired <S%H1245><s%> of them <S%H4672><s%>, he found them ten times <S%H6235><s%> better <S%H3027><s%> than all the magicians <S%H2748><s%> and astrologers <S%H825><s%> that were in all his realm <S%H4438><s%>.
And Daniel <S%H1840><s%> continued even unto the first <S%H259><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of king <S%H4428><s%> Cyrus <S%H3566><s%>.
